description: Try our easy to follow BBQ Mushroom Burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,High protein,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: BBQ Mushroom Burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Gourmet Garden Parsley Lightly Dried, divided
1 tbs Gourmet Garden Garlic Cold Blended Paste, divided
2 slices red onions, sliced thickly into 8 slices

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together in a small jug: 1 tablespoon oil, 1 tablespoon vinegar, 1 tablespoon parsley, 1/2 tablespoon garlic paste.
Place the mushroom caps in a low-sided bowl, pour mixture over and toss and spoon marinade into gills. Let stand at room temperature for 15 to 20 minutes.
Combine the mayonnaise with remaining parsley and garlic. Set aside.
Heat the BBQ or indoor grill pan over medium heat. Brush one side of the bread with remaining oil, place oiled side down on the grill, cook until grill marks form. Remove and keep warm.

Place the mushrooms and the onion slices on the grill, reserving marinade for basting. Grill for 4 to 6 minutes on each side, or until mushrooms and onion are tender and charred, brushing with marinade frequently.

Spread herb mayonnaise generously on unmarked side of toasted bread. Build the sandwiches/burgers by dividing rocket leaves, tomato slices, mushroom, grilled onion and cheese between 4 toasted slices of bread.
